verses.verse: <S%G1223>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> since we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> as we <S%G1653>received<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> we do not <S%G7051>lose<s%> <S%G7051>heart,<s%>

but we have <S%G550>renounced<s%> the <S%G2927>things<s%> <S%G2927>hidden<s%> because of <S%G152>shame,<s%> not <S%G4043>walking<s%> in <S%G3834>craftiness<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G1389>adulterating<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but by the <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> man's <S%G4893>conscience<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> our <S%G2098>gospel<s%> is <S%G2572>veiled,<s%> it is <S%G2572>veiled<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G622>perishing,<s%>

in <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1722>case<s%> the <S%G2316>god<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> has <S%G5186>blinded<s%> the <S%G3540>minds<s%> of the <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> that they might not <S%G826>see<s%> the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G1504>image<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For we do not <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> as your bond-servants for Jesus' <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5457>"Light<s%> shall <S%G2989>shine<s%> out of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%>" is the One <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G2989>shone<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to give the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3749>earthen<s%> <S%G4632>vessels,<s%> that the <S%G5236>surpassing<s%> <S%G5236>greatness<s%> of the <S%G1411>power<s%> may be of <S%G2316>God<s%> and not from <S%G1473>ourselves;<s%>
[we are] <S%G2346>afflicted<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>way,<s%> but not <S%G4729>crushed;<s%> <S%G639>perplexed,<s%> but not <S%G1820>despairing;<s%>

<S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4064>carrying<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> the <S%G3500>dying<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that the <S%G2222>life<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G5319>manifested<s%> in our <S%G4983>body.<s%>

For we who <S%G2198>live<s%> are <S%G104>constantly<s%> being <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>' <S%G1223>sake,<s%> that the <S%G2222>life<s%> of Jesus <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G5319>manifested<s%> in our <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

But <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to what is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "I <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G1352>therefore<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke,<s%>" we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G1352>therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2980>speak;<s%>

<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that He who <S%G1453>raised<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> will <S%G1453>raise<s%> us <S%G2532>also<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and will <S%G3936>present<s%> us with you.

For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> [are] for your <S%G1223>sakes,<s%> that the <S%G5485>grace<s%> which is <S%G4121>spreading<s%> to <S%G4183>more<s%> and more people may <S%G4052>cause<s%> the <S%G2169>giving<s%> of <S%G2169>thanks<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> we do not <S%G7051>lose<s%> <S%G7051>heart,<s%> but <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G1854>outer<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1311>decaying,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> our <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G2080>man<s%> is being <S%G341>renewed<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> by <S%G2250>day.<s%>

For <S%G3910>momentary,<s%> <S%G1645>light<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> is <S%G2716>producing<s%> for us an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G922>weight<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5236>far<s%> <S%G1519>beyond<s%> <S%G5236>all<s%> <S%G5236>comparison,<s%>

while we <S%G4648>look<s%> not at the things which are <S%G991>seen,<s%> but at the things which are not <S%G991>seen;<s%> for the things which are <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G4340>temporal,<s%> but the things which are not <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G166>eternal.<s%>
